   335â†’    if (e.key === 'Enter') {
   336â†’      e.preventDefault();
   337â†’      handleCellSave();
   338â†’    } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {
   339â†’      e.preventDefault();
   340â†’      handleCellCancel();
   341â†’    }
   342â†’  };
   343â†’
   344â†’  const handleFetchDomains = async () => {
   345â†’    const selectedId = Array.from(selectedHostAccounts)[0];
   346â†’    const selectedAccount = data.find(account => account.id === selectedId);
   347â†’    
   348â†’    if (!selectedAccount) {
   349â†’      setFetchError('Selected account not found');
   350â†’      return;
   351â†’    }
   352â†’
   353â†’    setIsLoading(true);
   354â†’    setFetchError(null);
   355â†’
   356â†’    try {
   357â†’      console.log('Fetching domains for account:', selectedAccount);
   358â†’      
   359â†’      const response = await fetch('/api/fetch-domains', {
   360â†’        method: 'POST',
   361â†’        headers: {
   362â†’          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   363â†’        },
   364â†’        body: JSON.stringify({
   365â†’          host_account_id: selectedAccount.id
   366â†’        })
   367â†’      });
   368â†’
   369â†’      const result = await response.json();
   370â†’
   371â†’      if (result.success) {
   372â†’        console.log('Successfully fetched domains:', result);
   373â†’        // Refresh the data to show updated domains_glacier
   374â†’        if (onDataChange) {
   375â†’          onDataChange();
   376â†’        }
   377â†’      } else {
   378â†’        console.error('Error fetching domains:', result.error);
   379â†’        setFetchError(result.error);
   380â†’      }
   381â†’    } catch (error) {
   382â†’      console.error('Error calling fetch domains API:', error);
   383â†’      setFetchError('Network error occurred while fetching domains');
   384â†’    } finally {
   385â†’      setIsLoading(false);
   386â†’    }
   387â†’  };
   388â†’
   389â†’  return (
   390â†’    <div className="space-y-4">
   391â†’      {/* Search */}
   392â†’      <div className="bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow">
   393â†’        <div className="flex items-center space-x-4">
   394â†’          <input
   395â†’            type="text"
   396â†’            placeholder="Search host accounts..."
   397â†’            className="flex-1 px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent"
   398â†’            value={searchTerm}
   399â†’            onChange={(e) => {
   400â†’              setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
   401â†’              setCurrentPage(1);
   402â†’            }}
   403â†’          />
   404â†’        </div>
   405â†’      </div>
   406â†’
   407â†’      {/* Results count */}
   408â†’      <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
   409â†’        Showing {paginatedData.length} of {sortedData.length} results
   410â†’      </div>
   411â†’
   412â†’      {/* Table */}
   413â†’      <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow overflow-hidden">
   414â†’        <div className="overflow-x-auto">
   415â†’          <table className="w-full text-sm">
   416â†’            <thead className="bg-gray-50">
   417â†’              <tr>
   418â†’                {/* Host Company columns on the left */}
   419â†’                <th className="px-4 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">
   420â†’                  company.id
   421â†’                </th>
   422â†’                <th className="px-4 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider">

   424â†’                </th>

   457â†’                  onClick={() => handleSort('id')}
   458â†’                >
   459â†’                  account.id {sortField === 'id' && (sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'â†‘' : 'â†“')}
   460â†’                </th>
   461â†’                <th 
   462â†’                  className="px-4 py-3 text-left text-xs font-medium text-gray-500 uppercase tracking-wider cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100"

   464â†’                >
   465â†’                  account.username {sortField === 'username' && (sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'â†‘' : 'â†“')}

   550â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500"

   554â†’              setCurrentPage(1);
   555â†’            }}

   558â†’            <option value={20}>20</option>
   559â†’            <option value={50}>50</option>
   560â†’            <option value={100}>100</option>
   561â†’          </select>
   562â†’        </div>
   563â†’
   564â†’        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
   565â†’          <button
   566â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   567â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(1)}
   568â†’            disabled={currentPage === 1}
   569â†’          >
   570â†’            First
   571â†’          </button>
   572â†’          <button
   573â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   574â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(currentPage - 1)}
   575â†’            disabled={currentPage === 1}
   576â†’          >
   577â†’            Previous
   578â†’          </button>
   579â†’          <span className="text-sm text-gray-700">
   580â†’            Page {currentPage} of {totalPages || 1}
   581â†’          </span>
   582â†’          <button
   583â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   584â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(currentPage + 1)}
   585â†’            disabled={currentPage === totalPages || totalPages === 0}
   586â†’          >
   587â†’            Next
   588â†’          </button>
   589â†’          <button
   590â†’            className="px-3 py-1 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm hover:bg-gray-50 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed"
   591â†’            onClick={() => setCurrentPage(totalPages)}
   592â†’            disabled={currentPage === totalPages || totalPages === 0}
   593â†’          >
   594â†’            Last
   595â†’          </button>
   596â†’        </div>
   597â†’      </div>
   598â†’
   599â†’      {/* Action Button */}
   600â†’      <div className="mt-4 flex flex-col items-center space-y-2">
   601â†’        <button
   602â†’          className="px-6 py-3 bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md font-medium hover:bg-blue-700 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:bg-gray-400"
   603â†’          onClick={handleFetchDomains}
   604â†’          disabled={selectedHostAccounts.size !== 1 || isLoading}
   605â†’        >
   606â†’          {isLoading ? 'Fetching domains...' : 'fetch domains_glacier'}
   607â†’        </button>
   608â†’        
   609â†’        {fetchError && (
   610â†’          <div className="text-red-600 text-sm bg-red-50 px-3 py-2 rounded-md">
   611â†’            Error: {fetchError}
   612â†’          </div>
   613â†’        )}
   614â†’      </div>
   615â†’
   616â†’      {/* Domains Glacier Text Box */}
   617â†’      <div className="mt-6">

   619â†’          <span className="text-sm font-bold text-gray-700">
   620â†’            host_account.domains_glacier {selectedHostAccounts.size === 1 && (() => {
   621â†’              const selectedId = Array.from(selectedHostAccounts)[0];
   622â†’              const selectedAccount = data.find(account => account.id === selectedId);
   623â†’              const companyName = selectedAccount?.host_company?.name || 'unknown';
   624â†’              const username = selectedAccount?.username || 'unknown';
   625â†’              return `(${companyName} - ${username})`;
   626â†’            })()}
   627â†’          </span>
   628â†’        </div>
   629â†’        <textarea
   630â†’          className="w-full h-64 px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm font-mono resize-vertical focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent"
   631â†’          placeholder={selectedHostAccounts.size === 1 ? "Domain data will appear here after fetching..." : "Select exactly one host account to view domains_glacier data"}
   632â†’          value={(() => {
   633â†’            if (selectedHostAccounts.size === 1) {
   634â†’              const selectedId = Array.from(selectedHostAccounts)[0];
   635â†’              const selectedAccount = data.find(account => account.id === selectedId);
   636â†’              return selectedAccount?.domains_glacier || '';
   637â†’            }
   638â†’            return '';
   639â†’          })()}
   640â†’          readOnly
   641â†’        />
   642â†’      </div>
   643â†’    </div>
   644â†’  );
   645â†’}

const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js');
const supabase = createClient(process.env.SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY);

async function addMissingFields() {
  try {
    console.log('ğŸ”§ Adding missing fields to host_account table...');
    
    // Try to add the missing columns
    const { data, error } = await supabase.rpc('exec_sql', {
      sql: \`
        ALTER TABLE host_account 
        ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hostacct_api_secret TEXT,
        ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS api_management_url TEXT;
      \`
    });
    
    if (error) {
      console.log('âŒ RPC error:', error.message);
      console.log('Manual SQL needed in Supabase dashboard:');
      console.log('ALTER TABLE host_account ADD COLUMN hostacct_api_secret TEXT;');
      console.log('ALTER TABLE host_account ADD COLUMN api_management_url TEXT;');
    } else {
      console.log('âœ… Successfully added missing columns');
    }
    
  } catch (err) {
    console.error('ğŸ’¥ Error:', err.message);
    console.log('Please run this SQL manually in Supabase dashboard:');
    console.log('ALTER TABLE host_account ADD COLUMN hostacct_api_secret TEXT;');
    console.log('ALTER TABLE host_account ADD COLUMN api_management_url TEXT;');
  }
}

addMissingFields();
